iebaker.neon.world

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • iebaker.neon.world.Vertex
      • iebaker.neon.world.Cell

  • public class Cell
extends Vertex
    Cell is a class representing a single cell of the game world. A cell can contain one or no Entity objects representing the occupant (or lack thereof) of that cell.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor.

      • getEntity

        public Entity getEntity()
        Retrieves the entity occupying this cell
        Returns:
        The entity which occupies the cell

      • getPosition

        public Vec2i getPosition()
        Retrieves the position in World coordinates of the cell
        Returns:
        A Vec2i which represents the cell's coordinates

      • isOccupied

        public boolean isOccupied()
        Convenience method which returns whether the cell is occupied with an entity
        Returns:
        true, if the cell is occupied, and false otherwise

      • onTick

        public void onTick(long nanos)
        Propagates ticking to entities who are not the NOTHING entity

      • onDraw

        public void onDraw(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Will recieve this call on draw. Should be overridden if this cell wants to be drawn.
